node.name: Way Of Learning
node.rich_text: Ye text kya keh raha hai?
Learning is Pattern-Based (हम वैसे ही सोचते हैं जैसे सिखाया गया है):
• Jaise math ka example:
Hum isko waise hi solve karte hain jaise hume school mein sikhaya gaya tha. Matlab humari soch ek
pattern

follow karti hai.
• Lekin hacker mindset ya penetration testing mein, agar hum
boxed thinking
(limited soch) mein fas gaye, to hum problems solve nahi kar paayenge.
Think "Outside the Box" (हदों के बाहर सोचना सीखो):
◇ Hacker mindset matlab:
alag nazariye se dekhna.
◇ Jo cheezein samajh nahi aati, unko samajhne ke liye
naye tareeke

, naye tools aur naye angles se sochna padta hai.
◇ Ye flexibility
pivoting
kehlaata hai – ek jagah se doosri jagah smartly move karna based on the situation.
Problem is Emotional, Not Logical (Problem ek feeling hoti hai):

◇ Jab hum kisi cheez ko nahi samajhte, hum frustrate hote hain.
◇ Lekin technically, wo
sirf ek situation hoti hai
, problem humare
emotional reaction

ki wajah se banti hai.
◇ Agar hum emotionally positive hain, goal pe focus hai, to hum zyada seekh paate hain.
Goal Clarity is Everything (Goal pata hai to raste mil jaate hain):
◇ Ek example diya gaya: ▪ Agar instructor bole:
"move karo"
– aur rasta mein chair aayi to ho sakta hai hum
baith jaayein

.
▪ Lekin agar instructor bole:
"corner tak jao"
, aur beech mein chair aaye, to hum us chair ko
cross karke goal tak pahuchne ki koshish karte hain

.
◇ Matlab:
Goal clear hoga to obstacle se rukenge nahi.
Conclusion:

◇ Sochne ka tareeka seekhna hai, na keval knowledge ya tools.
◇ Emotional control aur goal clarity bohot zaroori hai.
◇ Agar goal nahi hoga, to hum ek topic se doosre topic par bhatak jaayenge bina kuch achieve kiye.
